title: MOTOROLA E7 Power (Tahiti Blue, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, USB Cable, User Guide, SIM Tool
product_specification.Other Display Features: Anti Fingerprint Coating, 20:09 Display Aspect Ratio, Active Area-Touch Panel (AA-TP): 85%, Brightness: 330nits (Min), 380nits (Typ)
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B7/B8/B20/B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP Main + 2MP Macro Dual Rear Camera Setup
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Reader, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Powerful 5000 mAh Battery: With a powerful 5000 mAh battery and a Type-C charger, this Motorola E7 Power smartphone helps you breeze through your daily workloads with ease. You can play music for up to 76 hours, browse the web for up to 12 hours, or stream videos for up to 14 hours on a single full charge.
product_description.Large RAM and Internal Storage Capacity: This smartphone’s 4 GB of RAM coupled with the octa-core processor enables smooth performance and instant feedback with every swipe, touch, and tap. Plus, the 64 GB inbuilt storage lets you save your music, images, movies, and more with ease. In case you need more storage, you can expand this memory by up to 1 TB using a microSD card.
product_description.16.51 cm (6.5) Max Vision HD+ Display: The immersive 16.51 cm (6.5) Max Vision HD+ display of this smartphone enhances your movie- and video-watching as well as your gaming experience with rich and vivid details. Its 20:9 aspect ratio lets you enjoy more of your favourite content on its wide display.
product_description.Fingerprint Sensor: You can safely unlock this smartphone with just a touch by using the fingerprint sensor that's located within the 'batwing' logo on the back.
product_description.Stock Android Experience: This smartphone features a near-stock version of Android, enabling you to enjoy a bloat-free Android experience.
product_description.13 MP Rear Dual Camera System: While the 13 MP dual-camera system on the rear, with fast-focus, allows you to shoot beautiful portraits, landscapes, events, and more with great clarity, the 2 MP macro camera lets you capture minute details of a subject/object for a sharply defined image.
product_description.Water Resistance: The IP52-rated water-repellent design protects this phone from damage even if you get caught in a drizzle or accidentally spill a drink on it.
product_description.Google Assistant Support: You can press the dedicated button that's located on the side of this smartphone to launch Google Assistant. Thanks to Google Assistant, you can not only get answers to your queries by using voice commands but also get weather reports, traffic updates, and more without having to type, tap, or swipe on your screen.
product_description.Stunning Design: Featuring a stylish and attractive design, this smartphone is sure to grab the attention of onlookers whenever you take it out.

Pros:

1) Budget phone
2) Awesome Look
3) Screen size is massive
4) Battery backup is just 'aww'
5) Google assistant button is very interesting.
6) Rear Camera is good.
7) No malware, no nagware, no bloatware
8) Fingerprint sensor is so accurate, without any time lag
9) Fast processing
10) Storage is awesome

Overall, the best phone if u ignore front camera.

And by the way am a MOTO USER SINCE 3.5 yrs, and may be I love Moto much😉

Cons:

1) Adaptive brightness is not perfect cuz brightness is not that bright 😉

2) Front camera is average (a Budget phone)

3) It takes 1.5 hrs for a full charge from 30-35%
Excellent mobile at reasonable price with branded mobile with all features.Buy with confidence and enjoy the features of Motorola mobile..

Well it's just 14 hours from Purchase. Putting my finger crossed for a better performance from a person of a well to do family.

I am using this device as my secondary device and I am quite happy with the performance, but facing a little laggy despite having 80% free storage and 4GB RAM. Good things are a clean user interface, no ads, no bloatware, and battery backup also good. I don't use the camera that much as I mentioned it's not my primary but typing hepatic feelings is too good like a flagship. Considering the price point it's a very good device. I bought this in exchange three years old Nokia1 so it's felt very little for me.

PRO: Good battery, great display in the segment, phone feels good in hand, stock and clean android 10 no bloatware, moto gestures are awesome, buy it if you want good budget phone and you're more into multimedia

CONS: camera quality below average, Front camera is bad, don't buy if you're more into photography

Regarding it's brand value , this phone justified it's price . But this phone has major issues like - (1) very low bright display , (2) below average picture quality & (3) low powered MTK Helio G25 Chipset which is Rebranded version of Helio P22 . Overall , if you are looking for long battery usage and normal social media usage , it is one of the best option for you . Don't buy it if you expecting for lag-less gaming experience or superb camera quality .

1. Low Price
2. Good battery
3. Stock Android (hence best option for elderly ppl who cannot handle the annoying ads of Chinese Mobiles)

Negatives

2. Phone is too big (instead of such a big display they should provide better processor for the price)
3. Selfie camera is just okay
4. Despite being Moto mobile there are no Moto gestures

I purchased this mobile on 7th May 2021 after a lot of thorough research depending upon my usage and I am really astonished to see the performance.
Well, for me Camera is not much of an importance but the quality of image captured during dark hours are not so good but manageable. The 4 and 64 gb variant is very smooth. No bloat wares and I am loving it. One will get 49-50 gb internal memory initially. Battery takes 2hours to charge from 0-100 which I feel is decent because the backup is pretty good due to its 5000 mah battery which takes 1.5 days for me to drain. My usage is watching 7-8 hours of online video throughout the day and playing games occasionally.
Coming to games, it can play COD but in low settings but I would defer not to play huge games because of its processor. It will run smoothly initially but the performance of the phone will detoriate massively.
I got a plastic back cover attached with this phone in the box. No Tempered received. RAM management is very good if compared with the Redmi phones in 10k budget range. Speaker is awesome.
One thing which I did not realised since I was a Redmi user before this is that the motorola phones does not come with an inbuilt file manager and gallery folder unlike other brands. So that needs to be installed.

I bought this phone on 10th March 2021 from Flipkart. The delivery was very fast and hassle free. Now about the phone, The blue colour which I ordered was nice. Good thing is that this phone is water resistant. The phone is a bit heavy and feels bulky. The phone has got good performance, thanks to 4GB of RAM, 64 GB internal storage and near stock android software with minimal bloatware running on December security patch, inspite of running on an entry level processor. The software updates are not very quick like the android one phones from Nokia. The battery back up seems to be good. Adaptive brightness calibration doesn't seem correct, and brightness of the screen is always on the higher side. Both cameras are just average and camera interface is not very easy to understand. Overall a nice phone for this price range with a few short comings.

Worth the Money. In the Price range, It is the best. Camera suffers a bit during night but in day light it's fine. Good battery lasts more than a day for average usage. Performance is more than good (better). But we may able to see some lags for heavy usage as g25 is entry level processor. In normal usage, Not worries at all.
Near Stock Android is best and After Sales Support of Motorola is Really Good. This review is after using this for nearly 2months. Go for it If your budget is below 9k.

Bought the phone for my wife who was using a Asus earlier. It is large & heavy & OK for ladies who carry the phone in their purse / bag. To carry in trouser pocket or in hand will take some getting used to.

It performs well for the price. Screen resolution is just OK. However the large display makes viewing videos very comfortable. The battery life is really good needs charging only once a day for 4 - 5 hours screen time.

The chip is not the fastest but most apps load & function without any problem. Streaming services including Zoom is quite good without any lag / buffering.

Photos are just decent nothing great. A funny thing which happened a couple of times is the screen goes blank & Chinese characters appear on it. The phone continues in this mode for a couple of minutes then it boots again.

Overall a decent phone at a budget price. Don't have high expectations, you will not be disappointed.

Good for the price paid (About Rs.7200 after credit card offer).

PROS:
- Very good battery backup. I am charging once in 3 days.
- Good 64 GB storage.
- No Lag or hung issue for normal Calling, WhatsApp, Email, Map or similar usage. No games tried though...
- Call quality is good. Sound from person speaking other side is clear and loud even on crowded places.
- Good network reception.
- Volte works for Vodafone-Idea or Airtel thru home Wifi. Jio works fine.
- A plastic transparent protective cover comes bundled. So you save Rs.150 ;-)
- Big screen of 6.5 inch.
- MS-Teams works good and built in speaker is adequately loud and no external speakers should be needed to take online classes (My personal opinion).
- C type charger.
- Built in Wifi is very efficient. Its not choppy from the place where my old phones become very prone to disconnection.
- Edges are not rounded so a screen guard can stick happily.
- Feels sturdy.
- Flipkart delivery was awesome. Also my old phone exchange was seamless with the delivery person.
- The Box says its made in India (not sure how true it is...looking at the low cost)

CONS (none of them are show stopper though...)
- Camera is very basic.
- Little disappointed with the display brightness. Its little on a dull side.
- Phone is a little heavy and thick as it does have a big battery, so acceptable.
- The built in flash light is not so bright when I compare it with couple of other smartphones we have.
- Battery takes quite long time to recharge as the charger is of less capacity.

pros.5000 mAh Battery: This device comes with a massive 5000 mAh battery which helps you breeze through your daily workloads.
pros.Rear Camera: The 13MP + 2MP dual rear camera setup is good and does a decent job of clicking awesome pictures.
pros.16.51 cm (6.5) Max Vision HD+ display: The max vision HD+ display is beautiful and gives an amazing immersive experience. It has a good display visibility as well as proper brightness.

cons.Front Camera: The 5MP front camera is just average and is a great disappointment at this price range.
cons.Performance: The octa core MediaTek Helio G25 is slow and does not give optimal performance. Could have been better.

summary.verdict: The MOTOROLA E7 Power is a decent mid range purchase with some really good features.
summary.Additional Information: 64GB internal storage expandable upto 1TB, 13MP rear camera with rapid focus and HDR, Supports freefire in ultra mode.
